## WorkspaceSvg.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `WorkspaceSvg` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(options: Options, opt_blockDragSurface?: BlockDragSurfaceSvg, opt_wsDragSurface?: WorkspaceDragSurfaceSvg);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [Options](./blockly.options.md) | Dictionary of options. |
|  opt\_blockDragSurface | [BlockDragSurfaceSvg](./blockly.blockdragsurfacesvg.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Drag surface for blocks. |
|  opt\_wsDragSurface | [WorkspaceDragSurfaceSvg](./blockly.workspacedragsurfacesvg.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Drag surface for the workspace. |
